se450.elevator

Interface Floor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FloorImpl

    public interface Floor
    The interface for all the floors

      • pressButton

        void pressButton(DIRECTION direction)
        Send a request to Controller with the direction. Means someone pressed a up/down button in this floor, then controller should send an elevator to this floor.
        Parameters:
        direction -
